entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Breaking change] Changing EventSource OnEventCommand to be consistent #84586
  • attempting to use AOT on 32 bit should give specific error #84583
  • SslStream throws when using OpenSSL cert #84575
  • [wasm] Make runtime errors from simd and exception handling failures easy to understand #84574
    8.0.0
  • Source generator targets (from NuGet packages) not running on unsupported TFMs #84570
    8.0.0
  • ImmutableArray cast to IList does not conform to other collection's usage #84565
  • Unnecessary sign-extension for `(nuint)span.Length` #84564
    Future
  • ExceptionOnStartIsPropagated test failed in CI #84562
  • Missing Logging of Exceptions in IHostedService without await #84559
  • Can't build with the new Apple SDK #84557
  • Test failure tracing\\eventpipe\\bigevent\\bigevent\\bigevent.cmd #84555
    8.0.0

Closed

  • JIT: Optimize "static readonly valuetype" #62430
    8.0.0
  • SuperPMI benchmarks run should enable tiered compilation and pgo #68179
    Future
  • Test failure: Assertion failed `m_Initialized == Initialized` in tracing/runtimeeventsource/nativeruntimeeventsource/nativeruntimeeventsource.sh #83401
    8.0.0
  • The first character of the line is not written in Console.Write or WriteLine if Esc was pressed #84261
  • IPAddress.TryFormat returns false erroneously for shorter IP addresses #84482
    8.0.0
  • TestCurrentValueDoesNotAllocateOnceValueIsCached test failing in CI #84551
  • browser-wasm - WasmApp.targets No way to specify App Base Path #84516
  • Regex bug: Unrecognized escape sequence \\Z #84576
  • IsDaylightSavingTime returning False when it should be returning True #84563
  • SslStream throws when using (some?) OpenSSL self-signed certificates #84505
  • Update Compiler::optUpdateLoopsBeforeRemoveBlock() #84098
    8.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.Perf_Regex_Common #84139
    8.0.0
  • CctorForWrite failing with NativeAOT #84400
  • [Test] Test build does not give useful error if clr.hosts is not built #62744
    8.0.0
  • [Test] LibariesConfiguration should automatically be detected for runtime tests #63412
    8.0.0
  • [mono] Propagate pthread_kill EAGAIN to thread suspend initiator (remove workaround) #34132
    8.0.0
  • Experiment with icu4x usage for wasm #47875
    8.0.0
  • Creating a pinned GCHandle to an array of a blittable type may fail #48907
    Future
  • Regressions in System.Globalization.Tests.StringSearch #66344
    8.0.0
  • Test failure _AdvSimd_ro::JIT.HardwareIntrinsics.Arm._AdvSimd.Program.VectorLookupExtension_3_SByte() #84554
  • Investigate potential perf improvement if we call an int32 version of TryFormatInt64Default to format numbers less than int.MaxValue (for x86) #27575
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Update handling of limited register during consecutive registers allocation #84588
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement IUtf8SpanFormattable on all the numeric types in corelib #84587
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [RISC-V][JIT] Fix assert on passing double in struct #84584
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Deduplicate Binary Integer parsing logic #84582
    area-System.Numerics
  • [android][ios] Output Exported Symbols ItemGroup in LibraryBuilder #84581
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • AssemblyBuilder.Save add custom attributes handling. #84580
    area-System.Reflection, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix running tests against our DNNE'd NativeExports project to work in NativeAOT #84578
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Don't use AVX-512 for small inputs in Memmove due to throttle issues #84577
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Turn Wasm exception handling on by default and use WasmEnableExceptio… #84573
    area-Build-mono
  • [NativeAOT] Simplifying access to thread static variables #84566
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • DRAFT: optimize old typeinit/write fix #84558
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement IUtf8SpanFormattable on Guid #84553
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Fix System.Collections.Immutable.Tests #84552
    area-System.Collections, area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

  • [release/7.0][Android] Free up more disk space on CI builds #84567
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/6.0][Android] Free up more disk space on CI builds #84568
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Adding support for Vector512 `Equals`, `EqualsAny`, `op_Equality`, and `op_Inequality`. #83470
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • [wasm] Move the jiterp backbranch flag to a wasm local #84585
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • Add SIMD to LowerCallMemcmp #84530
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add SPMI benchmarks run collections for tiered and tiered pgo #84483
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Fix reserving executable memory as per allocation type in ClrVirtualAllocWithinRange() #83958
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.6
  • Implement IUtf8SpanFormattable on IPAddress and IPNetwork #84487
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Disable TestCurrentValueDoesNotAllocateOnceValueIsCached on mono #84571
    area-GC-mono
  • [release/6.0] Disable HardwareIntrinsics failing tests on Mono #84475
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 6.0.x
  • Update implementation of optUpdateLoopsBeforeRemoveBlock #84511
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve regex compiler / source generator for sets #84370
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 8.0.0
  • Fix minor jitdisasm issue #84548
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete `gtGetStructHandle` and friends #84212
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement IUtf8SpanFormattable on Version #84556
    new-api-needs-documentation, needs-area-label

Updated

  • Minor fixes to write barriers #75478
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [7.0] Reset OOB packages from 7.0.5 #84341
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.x
  • [6.0] Reset OOB packages from 6.0.16 #84342
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 6.0.x
  • Build on CBL-mariner host with rootfs #84148
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [JIT] Add support to inline the field access of primitive types marked with TLS #82973
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Memory Diagnostics: GC Bookkeeping #84454
    enhancement, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, area-GC-coreclr
  • dotnet.exe prints error messages to console when launched with empty DOTNET_MULTILEVEL_LOOKUP #84322
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Obsolete most of the remaining legacy serialization APIs #84383
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Runtime, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Delete `GT_OBJ` #84221
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Allow removal of HWIntrinsic nodes that do not have side effects #84110
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • add msquic to debug runtime on macOS #84181
    area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Suppress clang-16 warnings (backport #81573) #84444
    Servicing-consider, community-contribution, needs-area-label, 7.0.x
  • Mark tasks projects as non-source projects #84488
    area-Infrastructure
  • Added the ability to specify a Spin Count Unit via a GC Configuration to release/7.0 #84495
    area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • Private API for RefreshMemoryLimit #83707
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [wasm] Add Vector128 and PackedSimd support to the jiterpreter; add PackedSimd to the interpreter #82773
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • Exclude things which broken on Loongarch #78850
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Make host look for RID-specific assets via a known list by default #84100
    breaking-change, area-Host, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • [Mono] Enable the supported V128 SIMD intrinsics on Arm64 across all codegen engines #84289
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [release/7.0-staging] Add linker flags to add fixup data to PDBs (#58417) #84358
    needs-area-label
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0] Fix AwaitableSocketAsyncEventArgs reorderings on weaker memory models #84432
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Sockets, 6.0.x
  • [NativeAOT] Add System.Globalization.Native builds for iOS-like platforms #82393
    os-ios, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Suppress clang-16 warnings (backport #81573) #84443
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [mono][aot] Enable deduplication of runtime invoke wrappers #84304
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, os-ios, size-reduction, 8.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Microsoft.NETCore.Platforms: support adding rids with '-' in the base part (backport #84413) #84442
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [tests] Stand up iOS arm runtime tests and enable tracing/eventpipe tests #79169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • DependencyGraphViewer: Fix catastrophic designer fail for NodeForm #84539
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Always look for SIMD fields during promotion #84122
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use `gtNewIndir` in more places #84528
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable more general BITCAST folding in local morph #84144
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm-mt] Support async JS interop on threadpool threads #84494
    area-Threading-mono
  • [IGNORE][wasi] Open PR to run *all* the tests #81649
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-wasi
  • [wasm-mt] A version of LowLevelLifoSemaphore that uses callbacks on the browser #84491
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono
  • Expose setting CPU SamplingProfiler rate #83635
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Improve SequenceEqual for constant lengths unrolling #84524
    area-System.Memory
  • Initial work to enable native events in EventPipe #84318
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • [mono] fix two call get_default_jit_mm make hotreload work in non default alc #84247
    area-EnC-mono, community-contribution
  • Add PipeOptions.FirstPipeInstance enum value #83936
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [mono][jit] Use an mrgctx for all gshared methods on WASM. #82981
  • [mono][jit] Emit a null check when storing to valuetype fields. #82663
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `dotnet workload uninstall` does not support verbosity flag #31684
  • Error NETSDK1004 occurs when building any C++/CLI project. #31683

Closed

  • dotnet workload install wasm-tools does not install on Linux #31685
  • [NETSDKE2E][ARM64][Regression] Publishing blazorwasm project failed with error MSB3073: The command "embuilder.bat build MINIMAL" exited with code 1. #31330
  • [NETSDKE2E][Regression] Publishing blazorwasm project is blocked by"Emscripten Deadlocked" warning. #31209

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #31688
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 19.12.0 to 19.12.1 in /eng/dependabot #31682
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: main
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 19.12.0 to 19.12.1 in /eng/dependabot #31681
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: 7.0.3xx

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #31674
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • add --create-manifest-if-needed flag #31231
    Area-Tools

Updated

  • Move asset compression to the StaticWebAssets SDK #31559
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Register off-by-default analyzer: configuration binding generator #31654
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, .NET 8.0
  • Bundle Source Link packages #31632
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Wasm SDK packed as a nuget package #31519
    Area-Infrastructure
  • 9500 dotnet tool install: Add automatically tool upgrade and downgrade when specify version #31549
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • add implementation and test for add Trademark assembly attribute #31611
    untriaged, Area-Tools

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Compiler produces a *lot* of UncommonData instance values possibly unnecessarily. #67717
  • If option are sended to LSP client, its name and group name need to be frozen #67714
  • RangeVariableSymbol allows for 'null' location. #67713
  • C# Extract Method refactoring does not adhere to editorconfig settings for line endings #67711

Closed

  • IDE0045 gives a false positive #67649
  • Testing mermaid #67715

PullRequests

Created

  • WIP: not for review yet. #67727
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • LSP Completion Handler refactoring #67726
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Pool 'boxed' helper objects used during constraints checking #67724
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • [Draft - Help!] Generate comments as part of Extract Interface #67722
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Cache the DiagnosticDescriptors produced by the C# diagnostic analyzer #67720
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Move to a SegmentedHashSet from a SegmentedDictionary #67718
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Move caching of classifications to non-focus priority #67716
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Handle additional diagnostic scenarios for captured primary constructor parameters #67712
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Update text in lsp misc files workspace #67721
    Area-IDE, LSP, untriaged, Next
  • Remove linq allocation overhead #67725
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Produce less ArrayBuilder waste when converting to dictionary #67723
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Switch all usages of Locations[0] to GetFirstLocation() #67678
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Merge latest bits from `main` into `roles` feature branch #67700
    Area-Compilers
  • Remove enumerator allocation in MakeAndCheckNonTypeMemberModifiers #67719
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Cache exceptions thrown by DiagnosticDescriptor to avoid excessive string allocations #67690
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Next
  • Do not offer to simplify `if` statement to conditional expressions if both assignments are discards #67693
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Add debugger display for operations #67706
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next

Updated

  • Round-trip extensions via metadata #67530
    Area-Compilers, C# 12.0
  • Avoid realizing locations array when finding the symbol found in a particular location. #67691
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Ignore file-local source declarations when searching for well-known types #67183
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Reduce allocations based on light bulb experimentation #67203
    Area-Compilers
  • Interceptors #67432
    Area-Compilers
  • Initial pass at enabling prebuilt detection #67645
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Support attributes on primary constructors #67695
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Primary Constructors, 17.7
  • Work to unify threading concepts between Workspace and ProjectSystemProjectFactory (part1) #67522
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • [17.6] Only send workspace/configuration request when client supports that #67639
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Allow nested instance member access in `nameof` in static context #67461
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Bot rules for stale issues and PRs #67684
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fixes imposibility of Edit and continue for methods with attributes with type #67704
    Area-Interactive, Community, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Allow ProblemDetails property to be settable in ProblemDetailsContext #47633
  • Use IProblemDetailsService in ValidationProblem #47631
  • Auto revolve open-api docs from JsonHttpResult<TValue> type #47630
  • The Input Tag Helper renders DateOnly properties with an invalid date format #47628
  • Blazor static file url is incorrect when Blazor is running in a virtual app #47627
  • Create Blazor server-side rendering guidance for Blazor component library owners #47624
  • Support all ProblemDetail types in the multi response types for generating swagger docs MinimalApi #47623
  • Route syntax highlighting .NET 8 | VS code - Version: 1.78.0-insider #47622
    Discussions
  • Ensure other features interact well with Sections #47621
    8.0-preview5
  • Log on reset socket even if the logger is disabled #47620
  • Replace internal Microsoft.Extensions.Metrics with package #47618
    .NET 8.0
  • Allow to install BlazorWASM debug extension on VS Code on remote #47617

Closed

  • ValidationProblemDetails does not deserialize as expected #47223
  • Streaming rendering #46352
    8.0-preview4
  • Support DisplayNameAttribute on record properties #47585
  • add database and table by wizard in blazor united #47592
  • Support rendering components outside of the HttpContext #38114
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Heartbeat.TimerLoop continues running after WebHost stopped and disposed #47577
  • HttpContext.Session.GetString is Always Return Null in .NET Core 6 #47476

PullRequests

Created

  • Use WaitHandle in Kestrel heartbeat to quickly exit thread on stop #47619
    area-runtime

Merged

  • [release/7.0] Update spa-templates submodule #47626
    area-infrastructure, area-mvc, tell-mode, 7.0.6
  • [release/6.0] Update spa-templates submodule #47625
    area-infrastructure, area-mvc, tell-mode, 6.0.17
  • Fix Heartbeat logging after disposal #47580
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview4

Updated

  • Make TLS & QUIC Pay-for-Play (Redux) #47454
    area-runtime, blog-candidate
  • Add metrics to ASP.NET Core #46834
    area-runtime
  • Update SDK #47540
    area-signalr
  • [release/7.0] Web.ProjectTemplates: exclude 'Program.cs' from all templates that replace it. #47114
    area-mvc, 7.0.x
  • Set exception handler feature in developer exception page #47554
    area-runtime, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-10
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Post-Mortem Native and Managed Heap Diagnostics Improvements #3736
    8.0.0
  • Add migration documentation mapping .NET Framework performance counters to .NET Core metrics #3801
    8.0.0
  • DiagnosticPort docs incorrectly claim support of multiple listen ports #3809

  • should_check_bgc_mark and fgc_should_consider_object need to be updated for regions #2208
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Merged

    auto-merge

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .net MAUI FlexLAyout do not display correctly in .NET 7 framework with Android #14500
  • [Shell] Dynamically setting SearchHandler Query property does not update text in the search box #14497
  • Android WebView Source is Non-Functional #14496
  • StaticResource not found for key TransparentBackgroundButtonStyle #14495
  • BackgroundColor is not updated consistently by DataTriggers #14491
  • VS 2022 Maui is does not give the option for the GoogleServiceJson build action #14486

Closed

  • [Android] Slow scrolling, laggy performance #9485
    8.0-preview1
  • Incorrect layout when using a Grid with Star and Auto and a child has HeightRequest #14494
    Backlog
  • MAUI Blazor: System.IO.FileNotFoundException: '' on InitializeComponent() #14111
  • I tried to change picker title color in maui. but i can see still it's white color. #14358
  • [iOS] MediaPicker.Default.CapturePhotoAsync() returns PNG in which the picture's Orientation Data is lost and difficult to obtain #11379
    Backlog
  • Unnecesary files/folders in release android build #14437
  • MAUI App works only on Visual Studio Emulator #14378
  • EllipseGeometry not working correctly for Labels in IOS and MacCatalyst #14357
    Backlog
  • MAUI iOS simulator build does not include in plist all build environment properties #14306
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [Tests] Move sample build test to IntegrationTests #14499
  • Fix issue using FillRule with Paths #14493
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎
  • [xamlc] fix build error for System.Private.CoreLib #14492
    area/Xaml </>
  • [uitests] Work for get appium uitests with CI #14488
    area/infrastructure 🏗️

Merged

  • [android] reduce Java interop for `ContentViewGroup` and `WrapperView` #14275
    area/perf 🏎️
  • Refactor the device tests to avoid duplicate tests #14466
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Remove typo in ResourceDictionary docs #14483
    community ✨
  • [iOS/Catalyst] Fix clipping issues with some views #14362
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎
  • [net7.0] Microsoft.Windows.SDK.BuildTools can be transitive #14436
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [net6.0] Microsoft.Windows.SDK.BuildTools can be transitive #14435
    area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • [CI] Do not rebuild the ms tasks on device tests. #14476
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Updated Templates for Blazor apps for MacCatalyst #14196
    platform/macOS 🍏, area/blazor 🕸️, area/templates 📄, Blazor ❤️ MAUI
  • [Android] Properly remove the Frame's border thickness from the measureSpec #14452
    area/controls 🎮, control-frame, i/regression
  • [controls] fix memory leak in `CollectionView` #14329
    area/collectionview 📃
  • Build Debug and Release device tests #14392
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Adjust flex item position to account for reversal when laying out unconstrained #13936
    area/layout 🔲
  • [net7.0] Fix edge case with Grids, *s, and unconstrained layouts #14369
    area/layout 🔲
  • Propagate Title to android and ios window #14413
  • [Android] Fix Entry issues with Keyboard using IsPassword #14382
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, keyboard
  • [Android] Fix gestures in Label Spans #14410
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-label, area/gestures
  • `FocusRequest` is now a `RetrievePlatformValueRequest` #14475
  • [Core] Fix Border margin issue #14402
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮, control-border
  • [Windows] Fix Border corners clipping issue #14403
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮, control-border
  • Adding ContentInsets to iOS Keyboard Scrolling #14371
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, keyboard

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Inconsistent results when querying DateTime stored as integer #30660
  • Make the compiled query more suitable for use in Repository Pattern #30658
  • System.InvalidOperationException: Unable to track an entity of type 'Blueprint' because its primary key property 'Id' is null. #30657
  • Making Query Filter Extension Method failed #30655

Closed

  • Executing efbundle leads to failure in loading Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.FileExtensions file/nuget #30656

PullRequests

Merged

  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.OData from 8.1.0 to 8.1.1 #30659
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:

Updated

  • Update SDK #30608

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • installer UI says 17.4 is required, release notes say 17.5 #16028

Closed

  • In the installing UI of 5.0 Preview 2 on non-ENU OS, it shows ".NET Core 3.1" and "16.4" but not ".NET 5.0" and "16.6". #6849

PullRequests

Merged

  • Required source-build changes for Preview 3 #16020
  • Enable PVP flow for cecil #16024
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #16015
